body.name: Large 4 Sided Stainless Steel Oil Splatter Guard for Frying, (with Bonus Silicone Spoon Rest), Fry Wall, Non Stick Foldable Splatter Screen for Stove Top, Grease Splatter Guard, Premium Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 42 mins
features: ✅ GOODBYE KITCHEN MESS: Bid farewell to unruly oil splatters, stained walls, and the chaos of a greasy kitchen battlefield. baetle's 4-sided Stainless Steel splatter guard provides extended coverage to shield your kitchen from the aftermath of frying, sautéing, or making sauces and curries. Insulate surrounding items like plastic, spices, and cans from heating up or undergoing deformation!

✅ SUPER BUNDLE - GREASE SPLATTER GUARD + SPOON REST: Splash Guard comes with an unbreakable, BPA-Free, Food-Grade, Silicone Spoon Rest. No more messy spoon smudges on your countertop! A perfect combo for those who love spending their time cooking not cleaning!

✅ PREMIUM BLACK COLOR: Get functionality with contemporary aesthetics with a Powder-Coated Black Finish that adds a touch of elevated sophistication. The collapsible design, Stainless Steel Body, High-Quality Hinges, and Base Rubber Strips for skid protection, ensure a lightweight yet durable and stable shield for your Kitchen.

✅ VERSATILE USES: Use baetle’s versatile design 4-sided, 3-sided, or 2-sided as needed. It doubles as a water splash guard by the kitchen sink. Use it for barbeque on your balcony, or patio, or even pack it on camping trips for outdoor windproofing!

✅ EASY TO CLEAN AND STORE: Wipe the non-stick surface with a damp cloth or wash with soap for hassle-free cleaning. The Silicone Spoon Rest is dishwasher-friendly. When oil splash protection is not required, just fold it flat and easily store it in a cabinet, drawer, or pantry.

✅ 🎁 PERFECT GIFT OF CLEANLINESS — Gift this to someone who values a pristine kitchen and appreciates a thoughtful holiday present. Its smart functionality, premium design, and high quality will make for a memorable addition to their kitchen.
body.description: As a small family-run business enthusiastic about spotless kitchens, we are thrilled to introduce Baetle's 4-sided Stainless Steel Splatter Guard. This elegant Premium Black finish backsplash protector is a result of our commitment to delivering quality. More than just an oil splatter guard, it stands out for its larger dimensions, providing extensive coverage and a foldable design for easy use and storage. Crafted with precision using high-quality stainless steel and sturdy hinges, our durable kitchen oil baffle is versatile. It not only enhances your cooking experience by protecting walls from oil splatters but also proves effective near the sink while washing produce or doing the dishes. Take it outdoors, and it doubles as a wind guard during your culinary adventures. Cleaning is a breeze with a quick wipe or dish soap. Included in this package is a BPA-Free, Food-Grade Silicone Kitchen Spoon Rest, a delightful bonus that adds tidiness and joy to your cooking routine. This stove spoon holder not only keeps your counters clean but also keeps your cooking spoon within easy reach. Cleaning is easy, just toss it in the dishwasher! Please note: - Each product is handcrafted, and slight variations in size and color may occur. - Use caution as the product may become hot when near a heat source! - While we adhere to strict quality standards and have passed the ANSI/ASQZ1.4 (MIL-STD-105E) inspection standards, there is a possibility of finding a sharp edge. In such cases, use a small portion of the base rubber strips provided to cover any sharp corners for your safety and satisfaction.

reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Keeps the oil splatters off my backsplash and all my other stuff.. Looks high end and has a nice height to protect the cooking area from grease. Its foldable and cleans easily. I am literally using it every day since it was delivered… The spoon rest is a nice touch – to keep the soiled cooking spoons. Highly recommend if you hate the mess. 🙌🏼
